ocms_vip_vehicle.description: This table is refreshed daily via API 3 from CAS and stores the full list of VIP vehicles.

columns.name: vip_vehicle
columns.description: The primary identifier for the VIP vehicle record.

columns.name: vehicle_no
columns.description: The vehicle registration number.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description associated with the VIP vehicle.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the VIP vehicle entry.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Record creation timestamp.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user or process that created the record.

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Record last update timestamp.

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user or process that last updated the record.

ocms_cas_emcons.description: This table is created via API 1 to host notice numbers associated with the emcons_flag.

columns.name: notice_no
columns.description: The notice number from an EMCON notice.

columns.name: emcons_flag
columns.description: The flag associated with the EMCON notice.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Record creation timestamp.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user or process that created the record.

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Record last update timestamp.

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user or process that last updated the record.

ocms_court_case.description: This table is populated via API 4 to store court-related payment due dates for notices queried by PLUS.

columns.name: notice_no
columns.description: The notice number.

columns.name: court_payment_due_date
columns.description: The payment due date associated with the court case.

columns.name: cre_date
columns.description: Record creation timestamp.

columns.name: cre_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user or process that created the record.

columns.name: upd_date
columns.description: Record last update timestamp.

columns.name: upd_user_id
columns.description: ID of the user or process that last updated the record.
